body_html:
Hello, I have got the related error while training the NN with Tensorflow, any help? Thanks!

AttributeError Traceback (most recent call last)
in ()
loss = tf.reduce_mean(tf.nn.softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(yPredbyNN, Y))
---->optimizer = tf.train.AdamOptimiizer().minimize(loss)
CorrectPred = tf.equal(tf.argmax(yPredbyNN,1), tf.argmax(Y,1))
AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.python.training.training' has no attribute 'AdamOptimiizer'
